attributes.action: Give a right of appeal to the Energy Ombudsman Re-Sale Electricity & Gas 2003
attributes.additional_details:
Presently there is no right of appeal set out in the above subject issue. Residents of Mobile Homes have only the Site Owners favour to rely on for the Energy Tariffs & agreements etc etc, as he is the sole Main Account  Holder. As our site owner has his own modus operandi. As he has not consulted with the residents, we are are left with no Appeal to the energy watch-dogs, 
Therefore we are left in LIMBO with no alterative course of action, But to depend on the Site owners discretion !!!!!
attributes.background: This subject concerns the Mobile Home Residents who resides on Residential Park Home Sites in the U.K or citizens  who do not own their own Electric Meters. Only the Site Owner has modus operandi & control of the Tariffs & Agreements, without consultation with the residents

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about energy and gas tariffs but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the change in the law you would like to see.
